General.Name: Nerds on Site Inc
General.Description: Nerds on Site Inc. provides information technology (IT), hardware, software, and related support services to small to medium-sized enterprises in Canada and the United States. It offers managed IT and on-site IT support services; home computer support services, and home IT and service plans; cyber security services and solutions; and web services, including webs development, web hosting, web support, and SEO. Nerds on Site Inc. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in London, Canada.
General.Address: 4026 Meadowbrook Drive, London, ON, Canada, N6L 1C7
